topic.title: "Emed code" is not enough to actually embed
topic.body:
I've been trying to embed a playable audio file (hosted on IFS) in a post on my ZeroBlog
+ Experimenting with uploads: audio (see post and comments for more info)

But I've been having trouble because:

+ the Embed Code is not an embed code: there is no code, just an URL.
+ the URL is partial, not enough to make an embed work.

So what happened:
+ I pasted the Embed Code in my blog post. Nothing happened. :(
+ I searched online for "HTML embed audio code", found some code, and put it around the IFS Embed Code.
+ Player appeared :) ... but didn't work. :(
+ I asked for help from other people, who provided some suggestions.
+ I tried one, changing the start of the URL from
merged-CDN
to 
http://127.0.0.1:43110

+ That finally worked. :) At least so far, for me and the people who've given me feedback.

REQUEST:
The embed code should really be an embed code, with the necessary HTML and an URL that will actually work.

PS obviously I'm not very expert at these things, but making it a bit easier/clearer would be much appreciated.

Nothing happened. :(+ I searched online for "HTML embed audio code", found some code, and put it around the IFS Embed Code.+ Player appeared :) ... but didn't work. :(+ I asked for help from other people, who provided some suggestions.+ I tried one, changing the start of the URL frommerged-CDN to http://127.0.0.1:43110+ That finally worked. :) At least so far, for me and the people who've given me feedback.REQUEST:The embed code should really be an embed code, with the necessary HTML and an URL that will actually work.PS obviously I'm not very expert at these things, but making it a bit easier/clearer would be much appreciated.

comment.body:
Sorry to hear the original plan didn't work out but good to see you're taking steps to remedy it. I thinking scaling back could be the right way to get a result that actually works long-term.

However I'm not sure I can really look around / comment / participate myself, as I get this error when loading the site:

Internal error: Exception: No merger (147nKEb9bBJgBDgQytEQhmiGjF8e6HkEua) permission to load: 
merged-Antilibrary/19sZZmJPz1hADwitEs2XT6U46uHLGbHqKi/data/users/131Seivv6aH8vnohPmYPcPwPfZ1a5ubMMs/data.json (Antilibrary not in [])
UiWebsocket.py line 230 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 150 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 127 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 44
